name: GetItSMS WhatsApp APIs
description:
Send And Receive WhatsApp Bulk Messages(WhatsApp Marketing Messages) Through Whatsapp Business API Gateway(WhatsApp Green Tick Verification). For the Purpose Of Sending Notifications, OTPs, Or Anything Else Using Our WhatsApp Business API (WhatsApp Official API) Or WhatsApp OTP API and WhatsApp Chatbot. For Demo Contact Us(+91-7976724242) Or Register Here - http://sms.getitsms.com/signup 

Shopify Integration - https://apps.shopify.com/wpplugins

api_methods.name: GetIT SMS WHATSAPP API
api_methods.description: We are providing bulk whatsapp sms services.To use our whatsapp bulk sms  service you need api key.Go through our application and get our service.
